document_data.mainbody:
he Pride of Ahghairon was a famous ship of Waterdeep on the Sea of Swords from the citys early maritime history. It was named for Ahghairon, a former War Lord and the first Open Lord of Waterdeep.
By the early 14 century DR, a beautiful and detailed model of the Pride of Ahghairon was displayed in the hall of ships in the House of the Moon temple to Sel√ªne in Waterdeep.
